newsletter.subscribedMessage: You've been subscribed to our newsletter.

seo.title: Nuxt Landing Template
seo.description: Boost your coding productivity with AI-driven insights that tell you when and how to code most efficiently.

hero.title: AI-Powered Developer Productivity Platform
hero.description: Boost your coding productivity with AI-driven insights that tell you when and how to code most efficiently.

section.title: ***Revolutionize*** your coding experience
section.description: Transform your development workflow with AI-powered insights and personalized productivity optimization.

optimizeFocus.title: Optimize your focus time
optimizeFocus.description: Let AI identify your peak coding hours and adapt to your natural rhythm. Focus on what matters most - writing great code, while our system optimizes your productivity patterns.

trackHours.title: Track your best coding hours
trackHours.description: Track when you code best with smart analytics. Get actionable insights to tackle challenging tasks during your peak performance hours.

improveWorkflow.title: Improve workflow efficiency
improveWorkflow.description: Automate your workflow optimization from code snippets to focus management. Ship better code faster with a streamlined development process.

features.title: Take control of your ***productivity***
features.description: Make every coding session count with smart analytics and workflow optimization.

aiTracking.title: AI-Powered Focus Tracking
aiTracking.description: Discover your optimal coding hours with real-time AI analysis of your productivity patterns.

distractionAlerts.title: Distraction Alerts
distractionAlerts.description: Get notified when your focus drifts and bring your attention back.

codeSnippets.title: Smart Code Snippets
codeSnippets.description: Save and reuse frequently used code blocks for efficiency.

deepWork.title: Deep Work Mode
deepWork.description: Block distractions and set structured coding sessions with built-in Pomodoro timers.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Insights
collaborative.description: Sync your workflow with teammates and see when they are most productive.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Track your coding metrics and get insights to boost your speed and code quality.

steps.title: Start coding smarter in ***3*** ***steps***
steps.description: Transform your development workflow with our AI-powered assistant.

connect.title: Connect Your IDE
connect.description: Seamlessly integrate with VS Code, JetBrains, or your preferred editor. Get started in under 2 minutes with zero configuration needed.

track.title: Track & Analyze
track.description: Our AI silently monitors your coding patterns to identify your peak productivity hours and potential workflow bottlenecks.

optimize.title: Optimize & Code Smarter
optimize.description: Receive personalized recommendations to enhance your coding efficiency. Watch your productivity soar with data-driven insights.

pricing.title: Choose your ***productivity*** path
pricing.description: Unlock AI-powered coding efficiency with our flexible plans. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a team, we have the perfect toolset to maximize your development workflow.

pro.title: Pro Developer
pro.description: Perfect for individual developers focused on maximizing productivity.

features.tracking: AI productivity tracking to optimize your peak coding hours
features.alerts: Smart distraction alerts to maintain deep focus
features.library: Personal code snippet library for faster development
features.deepWork: Deep Work Mode with Pomodoro timer integration

features.teamSupport: Priority team support with dedicated manager

testimonials.title: Join thousands of productive ***developers***
testimonials.description: See how developers are transforming their coding workflow and achieving more with our AI-powered platform.

sarah.quote: Since using this tool, my productivity has doubled. The AI insights helped me find my perfect coding rhythm and now I ship features twice as fast.
sarah.name: Sarah Moriceau

sebastien.quote: Game-changer for our team. The focus tracking and smart alerts helped us reduce meeting interruptions by 40% and increased our sprint velocity.
sebastien.name: SÃ©bastien Chopin

benjamin.quote: Finally, a productivity tool that understands developers. The AI features helped me identify my peak coding hours and now I accomplish more in less time.
benjamin.name: Benjamin Canac
